items.label: Tempo only. Balance through finish; aim center target.
items.quickTip: PW → 7i → Driver, 5 balls each at ~70% speed.
items.insight: Light grip (4/10). Finish in balance. 'Brush the grass' with irons; 'wide then quick' with driver.
simSettings: Environment: Wind OFF; Altitude = local or sea level
Ball model/type: match your real ball (Premium if available)
Range ball mode OFF (unless you truly use range balls)
lookFor: Baseline carry numbers for PW, 7i, Driver

items.label: Full swings only. One club at a time to keep groupings clean.
items.quickTip: Pick one target; hit all balls with the *same* wedge before switching.
items.insight: Narrow stance, slight handle forward; prioritize consistent CARRY. Keep launch under ~30° for flighted shots.
simSettings: Display: Table view with Carry, Launch, Spin, Peak Height
Dispersion circles ON; same target each club
lookFor: Carry average and standard deviation per wedge

items.label: Do *not* alternate clubs. Hit 8×5i, then 8×4i (two clean groups).
items.quickTip: Set Compare/Dispersion view; finish 5i block, then switch to 4i.
items.insight: Evaluate playability via peak height + descent angle + dispersion. If 4i won’t hold, treat as a layup tool.
simSettings: Display: add Descent Angle & Peak Height columns
Green-sized target; dispersion ON; Compare Clubs ready
lookFor: Descent angle & peak height sufficient to hold greens
Carry std dev (tightness) for each iron block

items.label: No alternating. Finish one full block, then switch (two groups total).
items.quickTip: Block 1: Driver ×10. Block 2: 4W ×10 (or reverse).
items.insight: Compare carry, spin, and fairway-width dispersion. If 4W is tighter with near‑driver carry, it’s your gamer on tight holes.
simSettings: View: Compare Clubs; Dispersion map ON
lookFor: Fairway-width dispersion by club (single clear group each)

items.label: Targets: 95, 150, 185, 230 — one ball each. No redos.
items.quickTip: Routine → commit → accept the result.
items.insight: Mini Combine under time pressure. First‑try outcomes only.
simSettings: Scoring ON; same conditions (wind OFF, normalization ON)

items.label: Mobility + quarter/half swings. Tempo 3:1.
items.quickTip: PW only. 12 balls. Smooth and centered strikes.
items.insight: Focus on low‑point control: brush just after the ball. Auditory feedback (brushing sound) helps lock in consistent contact.

items.label: 7i to same target. Start‑line awareness.
items.quickTip: Pick a blade of grass 1–2 ft ahead and start over it.
items.insight: Calibrate face‑to‑path: tiny push‑draw and tiny cut are both fine — the discipline is starting over your intermediate spot repeatedly.

items.label: New yardage each ball (120–190). Full routine.
items.quickTip: Pick a number → pick a club → one ball only.
items.insight: Randomization builds retention and transfer. Change target shape and yardage every swing to simulate the course.

items.label: Full swings to known carries.
items.quickTip: PW→60°. Land past the front edge; control flight.
items.insight: Weight 60–70% lead side, shallow thump, hold your finish. Match backswing length to the window but keep tempo constant.

items.label: Par‑18: 9 approach targets, one ball each.
items.quickTip: Score it. No second balls.
items.insight: End with pressure to encode decision‑making under fatigue. Record score and dominant miss.

items.label: Land‑spot 3/6/9 paces. Minimal wrist.
items.quickTip: Ball slightly back, handle a hair forward.
items.insight: Feel chest‑driven motion: arms and club move together. Land on a coin‑sized spot and let rollout do the work.

items.label: Low/Mid/High with 56°. Match speed to land.
items.quickTip: Same swing, change ball position/face to change flight.
items.insight: Train three windows: ball back/neutral/forward with corresponding face. Keep speed through the ball; use the bounce, not the leading edge.

items.label: 10 random lies — one ball each. Par = 2.
items.quickTip: Read lie → choose landing → commit.
items.insight: Change lie/trajectory each rep. Keep a simple pre‑shot: lie → landing → loft → swing cue.

items.label: Open face, weight forward. Splash 1–2 in. behind.
items.quickTip: Chest turns, sand exits with the ball.
items.insight: Feel the bounce slide. Keep speed; don’t stop in the sand. Picture throwing a shovel of sand onto the green.

items.label: Same swing; vary face/stance. 10/20/30 ft.
items.quickTip: Open more for higher/shorter; square more for lower/longer.
items.insight: Use stance width and face openness to scale carry without changing effort. Maintain consistent entry depth behind ball.

items.label: Two tees as a gate, 6–8 ft putts.
items.quickTip: Set the gate just wider than a ball. 20 reps.
items.insight: Shoulder‑driven stroke, quiet wrists. Miss the tees on the way back and through; hold the face to the intermediate spot for 6 inches post‑impact.

items.label: 20/30/40 ft. Stop inside 3 ft past the hole.
items.quickTip: Match backswing length to distance; even tempo.
items.insight: Build a personal pace map: same tempo, longer stroke for longer putts. Past‑the‑hole beats short — train capture speed.

items.label: 10 putts from 6–8 ft, one ball each.
items.quickTip: Full routine; read once; commit.
items.insight: Visualize entry point and last 2 feet. Breathe → look → roll. Record make % to track pressure skill.

items.label: Low/Mid/High × Straight/Draw/Fade.
items.quickTip: Hold same posture; change face/ball position for window.
items.insight: Hit 9 flights in a 3×3 grid. Control start line first; then shape and height. This builds command of trajectory windows and curvature.

items.label: 60‑shot standardized test (carry based).
items.quickTip: 6 shots to each target distance, plus drivers.
items.insight: Targets typically cover 60–180 yds and driver. Use results to set practice priorities by distance.
